name: RGB Disorder
description:
RGB disorder is a game about multiple personality disorder.

Freds personality was split into three:

RED - explosive, initiative, physically strong

GREEN - vivid, perceptive, creative

BLUE - calm, clever

Now these three personalities have to work together to keep fred alive.

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement

Mouse - camera

Q - swap character

E - interact

CREDITS:

Solo dev - Tomáš Selmeci (selmecitom)

Sounds from https://freesound.org
